name: Reading csv files from Cloud Storage to Write to Bigquery Python flex template
description: A Python flex template to read csv files from Cloud Storage to Write to Bigquery Table.

parameters.name: input_books_csv
parameters.label: Input Path of Books CSV
parameters.helpText: Path to the CSV file containing books data (e.g., gs://your-bucket/books.csv).

parameters.name: input_libraries_csv
parameters.label: Input Path of libraries CSV
parameters.helpText: Path to the CSV file containing library data (e.g., gs://your-bucket/libraries.csv).

parameters.name: output_bq_table
parameters.label: Output BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table to write the output data to (e.g., project.dataset.table).
